data.text: Pick me up to the restaurant this evening!

data.text: I'm sorry. I didn't hear what you said. What was that?

data.text: Excuse me, I didn’t catch it, could you please say that again?

translation.text: Xin lỗi, tôi đã bắt được nó, bạn có thể vui lòng nói lại không?

title: How to be More Polite in English | POLITE Expressions
